summary: Military installations rely on nearby communities for commodities and infrastructure, such as electricity, access roads, and telecommunications. To help protect its installations from the effects of climate change and extreme weather, DOD coordinates with communities to improve infrastructure resilience. Three DOD grant programs help fund studies and improvements. For example, DOD helped fund a study that led one community to elevate a road leading to...
title: Climate Resilience: DOD Coordinates with Communities, but Needs to Assess the Performance of Related Grant Programs
